rules.text: Registrations are only accepted from those who demonstrate a serious interest in food and wine. Please make this clear in the "reason for joining" field, or we will reject your application. See our about page for more details.
No threatening, abusive, or intolerant behaviour. We have a zero tolerance policy on racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Your account will be suspended in such cases.
No commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts or impersonating legal entities. All such accounts will be suspended and potentially removed.
You must be at least 18 years old to use this service.
Our servers and data are located in Germany. Anything illegal in Germany and/or the European Union is prohibited.

After registering, please edit your profile, add a short bio and post a short introduction to yourself.
We may delete inactive accounts where this has not been done, after 30 days.
